description: Data captured by an agent representing an event occurring in a monitored service

id.description: Hex encoded 64 random bits ID of the error.

trace_id.description: Hex encoded 128 random bits ID of the correlated trace.

transaction_id.description: Hex encoded 64 random bits ID of the correlated transaction.

parent_id.description: Hex encoded 64 random bits ID of the parent transaction or span.
